answer:
We recommend that you call the health unit or location where you have booked your immunization appointment for that information. Immunize BC provides answers to questions about vaccines, but does not provide vaccines.
Immunization Nurse
question: Can my son get his kindergarten shot at the wensday drop in at the same time my 6 month gets his 6 month vaccine
